feed.title: cgay’s random notes
feed.subtitle: I'll probably mostly be writing about Dylan programming.

entry.title: New Blog
entry.content:
This is my new blogospace, using GitHub Pages and Jekyll to generate a simple static site. I have a few posts still at my old Wordpress blog which I’m still not sure if I’ll migrate over here. We’ll see how it goes.

Meanwhile, let’s see if Jekyll knows how to highlight Dylan code…
entry.summary: This is my new blogospace, using GitHub Pages and Jekyll to generate a simple static site. I have a few posts still at my old Wordpress blog which I’m still not sure if I’ll migrate over here. We’ll see how it goes.
